H0.text: Taking in oxygen and transporting it to cells of the body is one way the circulatory system and endocrine system interact in the human body.

H1.text: Releasing hormones and transporting them to cells is one way in which the circulatory system and the endocrine system work together in the human body.

H2.text: Absorbing nutrients from food and transporting them to cells in the body is one way the circulatory and endocrine systems interact in the human body.

H3.text: Collecting waste products from the cells and transporting them out of the body is one way in which the circulatory system and endocrine system interact in the human body.

A4.text: hormones are released by internal glands directly into the circulatory system and that target and regulate distant organs
